attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
by using the the term guaranteed Pension credit to discriminate against the Pensioner.
Pensioners who recieve Guaranteed Pension Credit are denied the same level of relief on Mortgages enjoyed by the under 60's, in fact they recieve half the ammount.
It is Age discrimination and must stop!.
parity must be done now
